page.title: 11ORMSKIRK MARKET
page.content: Ormskirk Market is held every Thursday and Saturday unless Christmas day falls on one of those days. There are 141 stalls most of which have been there over ten years. There is a waiting list which indicates it's popularity with traders. The food market is now held on a car park but the non food stalls still form a street market in Aughton and Moor streets.Pedestrianisation has made shopping safer but some of the stall holders think that some of the character of the market has been lots. A survey of 86 shoppers revealed that most lived in or near to Ormskirk, had travelled by car or had walked to the market. Most had come to buy fresh food and vegetables. In summer, the market is a tourist attraction with special buses being laid on from Southport.
